summary: Sales professional with extensive experience in merchandising, customer service, POS operations, cash handling, and inventory control. Proven ability to train staff, meet sales targets, and ensure store security and smooth operations.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Supported store merchandising, supervised sales staff in the absence of management, delivered customer service excellence, trained sales staff, managed cash handling and POS transactions, and maintained inventory control and security system operations.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Assisted with merchandising, supervised sales staff, provided customer service, ensured store readiness, trained staff on policies and selling techniques, managed cash handling and POS transactions.

experience.title: Team Member/Cashier
experience.description: Participated in incentive programs, performed cash and card transactions, opened/closed the store, and operated POS systems; collaborated with team to achieve objectives.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant/Receptionist
experience.description: Managed front desk and reception area, drafted meeting agendas, maintained electronic and physical files, handled high-volume communications, and supported office operations.

education.degree: BA in Communications - Marketing And Sales
